From the [Network Observatory](https://twitter.com/O_de_R) together with [Democracia en Red](https://twitter.com/fundacionDER) and the [National Democratic Institute](https://twitter.com/NDI) we are excited to announce the relaunch of our **[PoliticxsentwitteR website](https://oderedes.shinyapps.io/PoliticxsentwitteR/)** ğŸ¦ğŸ“Š, now with updated data up to June 2022! ğŸ‰
